DOC.brief_summary: The objective IMPACT ( Investigation Motivational Interviewing Prevention Consults Achieve Cardiovascular Targets ) determine best management strategy patient undergo cardiovascular intervention . IMPACT prospective randomize trial enroll 400 patient post-cardiovascular intervention . The study compare different cardiovascular prevention strategy : ( 1 ) usual care , ( 2 ) cardiovascular prevention consult , ( 3 ) cardiovascular prevention consult behavioral intervention program 6-month period . The trial hypothesis patient undergo cardiovascular intervention , prevention consult behavioral intervention superior usual care reduce cardiovascular risk . The primary endpoint non-HDL cholesterol . Secondary endpoint include lipid value , metabolic risk , smoke cessation , physical activity , nutritional status , medication adherence quality life . IMPACT schedule begin enrollment June 2012 .
DOC.detailed_description: SPECIFIC AIMS Primary aim : The primary aim target Cardiovascular Prevention consult reduce non-HDL cholesterol compare usual care 6 month post-intervention . Secondary aim : The secondary aim target Cardiovascular Prevention consult plus behavioral intervention reduce non-HDL cholesterol compare usual care 6 month post-intervention .
DOC.criteria: least 21 year age old Subjects schedule undergo percutaneous coronary peripheral vascular intervention Patients must ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document Life expectancy le 1year Inability walk
